synthesis_conditions.solvents: DMF solution of INA and CoCl2
synthesis_conditions.time: Sampled every hour until Co occupancy reached 100%
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Solution decanted and replaced for next step
synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: CBAB linker in PCN-160-imine exchanged with Co-isonicotinate moiety

synthesis_conditions.solvents: DMF solution of INA and Zr4+
synthesis_conditions.time: 2 hours for structural transformation to complete
synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: New Zr6 cluster formed at the center of the octahedral cage of PCN-160-CoCl2 after treatment

materials.name: PCN-161 structures with various MX2(py)4 units

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: MX2 (M = Co2+ or Fe2+; X = OH@, Cl@, Br@, I@, NCS@ or NCSe@)
synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: Single crystals of the PCN-161 structures with Co(OH)2(INA)4, CoCl2(INA)4, CoBr2(INA)4, CoI2(INA)4, Co(NCS)2(INA)4, Co(NCSe)2(INA)4, FeCl2(INA)4, FeBr2(INA)4, FeI2(INA)4, and Fe(NCS)2(INA)4 were successfully obtained
